creator: Cointelegraph By   William Suberg
title: Binance exchange daily BTC withdrawals top $500M as CZ says 'FUD helps us grow'
dc:creator: Cointelegraph By   William Suberg
content: Bitcoin withdrawals surge as Binance recovers from a media storm and subsequently accusations of suspicious activity.

title: 南方東英於港交所上市BTC、ETH期貨ETF，成亞洲首批加密貨幣ETF

content:
